metadata.description: Hash Egg is the Source of Hash Eagleâ€™s Life-which is the World's First Hashrate NFT. Hash Eggs are Hash NFTs with basic mining income, and have a probability of hatching as Hash Eagles. Hash Eggs and Hash Eagles, as Hash NFTs, both can be interpreted as an asset certificate of a 'mining machine' device with triditional colletable Value and NFT features.The Hashrate provider of Hash Eggs and Hash Eagles is F3, registered in Singapore and focuses on Filecoin distributed storage, and integrates Web3.0 infrastructure building. Based on the decentralized financial solutions from F3, Hash Eggs and Hash Eagles become a bridge to connect hashrate suppliers and miners, and realizes trusted, efficient and secure decentralized cloud hashrate transactions through smart contracts. Web: https://www.f3.xyz/
metadata.name: Hash Egg1
